products.name: Garden Weeding Robot
products.description: This 8-piece rattan patio sofa set has a modern look and exquisite rattan craftsmanship for most styles place. The high-density sponge cushion and ergonomically designed angle provide a comfortable seating experience, which allows you and your guests sitting for relaxing and enjoying the outdoors. What's more, the furniture's sturdy steel frame, quality PE rattan, more advanced polyester fabric, and tempered glass countertops make it suitable for all-weather environments, ideal for indoor and outdoor use, poolside, deck or terrace for you. It offers a comfortable and exceptionally stunning outdoor setting.
comments: It is not easy to tell if the robot is on or just stuck. Not clear what the lights are doing on it other than just being entertaining...
I was so hoping that this would work but it runs for about 5 to 10 minutes then stops.

products.name: Weed Grabber
products.description: Environmentally-friendly alternative to using chemicals to kill weeds. Easily change tool heads. Caution: Do not use during a lightning storm
comments: Came quickly, assembled without issue and more importantly- worked exactly as promised!!

I was so excited to receive this item as it looked like a very big gardening help. The 1st time it was used the plastic on bottom of pole busted. My husband liked the idea of it s o purchased another handle...used it a second time and the blade at the bottom just came right off. It was being used on regular weeds in sidewalk cracks. So disappointed in product!!
This thing broke almost 10 minutes into its first use. We tried everything we could to fix it, but it got snagged on a weed and the rod broke in two. Frustrating
